com.github.peterbencze.serritor.internal.web

Class SecuredWebApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.peterbencze.serritor.internal.web.WebApi
      • com.github.peterbencze.serritor.internal.web.SecuredWebApi

  • public final class SecuredWebApi
extends WebApi
    A secured web API implementation that allows users to register HTTP and WebSocket endpoints that can be used to interact with the crawler while it is running. Users are required to authenticate before they can access restricted endpoints (if they are authorized to do so).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecuredWebApi(ServerConfiguration serverConfig, AccessControlConfiguration accessControlConfig)
      Creates a SecuredWebApi instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHttpEndpoint(HttpMethod httpMethod, String path, HttpHandler handler)
      Adds an HTTP endpoint to the web API that is accessible to anyone (regardless of if they are authenticated or not).
      void addHttpEndpoint(HttpMethod httpMethod, String path, Set<String> allowedRoles, HttpHandler handler)
      Adds an HTTP endpoint to the web API that is only accessible for users who are authenticated and have any of the roles specified.
      void addWebSocketEndpoint(String path, Set<String> allowedRoles, WebSocketHandler handler)
      Adds a WebSocket endpoint to the web API that is only accessible for users who are authenticated and have any of the roles specified.
      void addWebSocketEndpoint(String path, WebSocketHandler handler)
      Adds a WebSocket endpoint to the web API that is accessible to anyone (regardless of if they are authenticated or not).
      AccessControlConfiguration getAccessControlConfiguration()
      Returns the access control configuration.
